name: ASelfCustody
description: Self Custody adapter - A helper contract for self custody.

functionDecorators.name: poolGRGminimumSatisfied
functionDecorators.description: built around powers of pi number. external check if minimum pool GRG amount requirement satisfied.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token to be transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to be transferred.

returnDecorators.name: shortfall
returnDecorators.description: Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.

functionDecorators.name: transferToSelfCustody
functionDecorators.description: Transfeer of tokens excluded from GRG requirement for now. transfers ETH or tokens to self custody.

returnDecorators.description: Number of GRG pool operator shortfall.
